long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VeeZa-V screen sharing extension! We are happy to inform you that with all the currents features, we offer you the capability to share your screen with your customer (with one click!).

FEATURES:
- Video/audio communication button for current and future clients without profile or e-mail exchange
- A single point of contact and a single click for customers
- Option for the client to leave a video or audio message
- Transferring video calls from one agent to another without any action from the client
- Call Priority System
- One-click communicationfor your current and future customers
- Unlimited client queue
- Customers are informed of their position in the queue
- Screen Sharing (with this Chrome extension)

EQUIPMENT REQUIRED
- Chrome browser (with this extension for sreen sharing)

INSTALLATION OF PERSONALIZED BUTTON
- Easy installation of the system; only the hyperlink provided by VEEZA-V is required to create your custom button on your website
- Personalization of the company's communication page

SYSTEM SECURITY
- Very secure communication (point-to-point encryptions, with a key of 36 alphanumeric characters changed after each call)
